actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of Agriculture should promote a multilateral agricultural agreement with the top five agricultural producing countries.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of Agriculture should negotiate a multilateral agreement with the top five agricultural producing countries to limit agricultural production.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of Agriculture should promote a multilateral agricultural agreement with the top five agricultural producing countries.
